info.name: Kongregate Dark by DanElectro
info.description: Dark theme for Kongregate with minor adjustments and tweaks
info.additionalInfo: 10/09/14 - Some fixes for the forums 10/06/14 - Fix for changes made to Kong. 08/13/14 - Small fix. Moved Hide RC toolbar function to different script DotD tools 05/04/14 - More fixes and tweaks 05/02/14 - Tweaks and fixes, added color options 05/01/14 - Beta upload
